Potion of Healing (Item)

Basic Properties

  • Item Type: Potion
  • Class: PotionOfHealing
  • Rarity: Common
  • Price: 30 gold (when identified)

Effect

  • Healing: Restores 100% of max HP to the drinker (full health restoration)
  • Status Curing: Removes Poison, Cripple, Weakness, and Bleeding status effects
  • Shattering: When shattered on the ground, heals 50% of max HP to any character on that tile
  • Arrow Moistening: Can be used to create Health Arrows

Java Implementation

  • PotionOfHealing.java
  • Uses the heal() method: ch.heal((int) (ch.ht()*portion), pseudoPotion)
  • Detaches specific buffs: Poison.class, Cripple.class, Weakness.class, and Bleeding.class

String Resources

  • PotionOfHealing_Name, PotionOfHealing_Info, PotionOfHealing_Apply

Configuration

  • Label index: 5 (for sprite identification)
  • Identified pricing: 30 * quantity() when known
  • Not identified pricing: Uses default price method

Entity Kind

  • Entity Kind: PotionOfHealing (returns getClass().getSimpleName() from NamedEntityKind interface)

Related Entities

  • Potion - Base potion class
  • Poison - Status effect cured
  • Cripple - Status effect cured
  • Weakness - Status effect cured
  • Bleeding - Status effect cured
  • Health Arrow - Result of arrow moistening
